title: "Let's Go to a Diner!"Transliteration: "Famiresu Iko!" (Japanese:ファミレス行こ！)
transformers_text: Let's Go to a Diner Transliteration Fa mires u I ko Japanese A Giant Rookie Mori hito and Nico attend their first day of high school with Mori hito warning Nico not to reveal she is a witch or use any magic However during homeroom Nico blows her cover when she accidentally casts an Em big gen spell on herself As a result she becomes the most popular girl in class Let's Go to a Diner After class classmates Kara Minami and Kuku mi Ure s hino ask Nico to eat with them at a nearby diner which Nico accepts They ignore the advances of a trio of delinquents as the enter the diner and quickly become friends while Mori hito secretly beats up the delinquents to prevent them from further harassing the girls The Flying Classroom The next day Nico's classmates asks her to show off her magic She sets up a field that allows them to fly but a truck accidentally drives into it forcing Mori hito to use his ogre powers to rescue the driver Despite Mori hito's fears his classmates accept him as well
